name.doc: A human-readable name for this system.

metadata.doc: Arbitrary properties useful to track with this system, but do not influence the design or behavior. Properties should be prefixed to avoid collisions, like 'mapbox:'.

theme.doc: App-level theme that defines colors for all UI elements.
Value describing the set of building blocks used to generate UI elements.

contrast.doc: Foreground color anchor. 0 = no contrast, 100 = maximum contrast.

warmth.doc: Background and foreground hue adjustment. 0 = blue (180°), 100 = red (360°). As warmth approaches 50, saturation is reduced to 0. Can be used to adjust highlight hues.

saturation.doc: Global saturation adjustment. 0 = no saturation, 100 = full saturation.
